I renewed my bike insurance today. "Big deal" is the response expected ğŸ˜ƒ. Anyway, I reluctantly parted with Â£83 ($106) for another year of motorcycle bliss.
However, after talking to a friend in London, I was horrified to discover that our capital is officially the world's most expensive place to insure a bike... Â£942 ($1200). For a experienced rider with an advanced licence.
I will never complain again! Then again., me riding in London? You've got more chance of seeing a sea sponge playing a banjo. ğŸ¤£
